item.description:
This next meeting should be a good one. We are going to have a round panel discussion debating the advantages/disadvantages of Ruby vs. Java. For all those that are sick of type checking and 'shoved down your throat' exception handling be sure to come support your favorite language! :)

(All in good spirits...)

If you are unfamiliar with the Westbrook and are unsure where the MESDA offices are please let me know. I'll do my best to give some more details. It is fairly easy to find however, and is a large brick building with with a big sign out front.

group.name: The Portland Maine Ruby Meetup Group

item.name: The Portland Maine Ruby November Meetup
